parse.title: List of concerts at NDK, Sofia

text.*:
Night view of NDK

The National Palace of Culture (short NDK) is one of the major venues in Sofia, Bulgaria. The main Hall 1 with its more than 3500 comfortable seats has hosted many famous performers and hit spectacles.[1]

Below is a list of some of the events that have been held there.

Contents

  • 1 Hall 1
    • 1.1 Rock, pop and jazz performers
      • 1.1.1 Bands
      • 1.1.2 Solo artists
    • 1.2 Classical music performers and other spectacles
  • 2 References
  • 3 External links
